certifications.description: Completed an essential learning certification in C++ programming. She demonstrated advanced proficiency in C++ language syntax and object-oriented programming principles.
certifications.title: C++ essential learning

projects.name: Face Recognition System
projects.description: We utilized Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for feature extraction and classification. Implemented CNN-based models for face recognition, achieving high accuracy rates. Integrated the system into various applications for automated identity verification. She contributed to deploying the system in real-world scenarios for enhanced security measures.

projects.name: Netflix clone using Frontend development
projects.description: Developed a Netflix-inspired streaming service clone using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented a responsive user interface resembling the Netflix layout for browsing movies and TV shows. Integrated external APIs (e.g., TMDB API) to fetch movie and TV show data for display within the application. Utilized modern CSS techniques like Flexbox or Grid for layout design and media queries for responsive design.

projects.name: Neuro AI
projects.description: Advanced Early Alzheimers detection and classification through Deep Learning. Technology Used: Machine Learning - Deep Learning and its pre-trained models like VGG16, transfer learning, InceptionNetV3.

experiences.description: 4 Weeks of Learning with some minor projects. 5th week final Mega Project Submission. Implemented performance optimization technique to enhance website speed and user engagement, resulting in a 50 boost in overall site performance. Facilitated mentorship programs with Engineers from EY and Edunet Foundation, gaining practical insights into software development practices and scalability principles, enhancing my expertise in real-world application development.

full_output.name: Shreya Tiwari
achievements_and_awards: Conquering over 200+ LeetCode challenges, including 40+ hard questions, demonstrating dedication, tenacity, and proficiency in tackling complex coding problems, thereby sharpening skills and expanding the repertoire in algorithmic optimization.
Engaged in coding competitions hosted by LeetCode, effectively tackling numerous questions and honing expertise across various topics in data structures.
